IRS990.MissionDesc: ELWYN MAKES LIFE BETTER FOR PEOPLE WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND BEHAVIORAL HEALTH CHALLENGES.
IRS990.Desc: FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES ("FSS") IS A NON-PROFIT CORPORATION THAT PROVIDED EARLY INTERVENTION SERVICES, EARLY LEARNING SERVICES, PARENTING EDUCATION AND SUPPORT PROGRAMS, SCHOOL-BASED CHILDCARE, AND PRESCHOOL PROGRAMS. FSS OPERATED AND PROVIDED SERVICES IN PENNSYLVANIA. DURING THE FISCAL YEAR ENDING JUNE 30, 2021, FSS transferred ITS PROGRAMS AND CONTRACTS TO Elwyn of Pennsylvania and Delaware ("Elwyn PA"). AS PART OF THE TRANSFER, THE EMPLOYEES OF FSS BECAME EMPLOYEES OF ELWYN PA. DURING THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2022, FSS DID NOT PROVIDE ANY SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FSS HAS BEEN RECOGNIZED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE ("IRS") AS A TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION AS DESCRIBED IN SECTION 501(C) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE ("IRC") AND IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES PURSUANT TO SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE IRC. HOWEVER, AT TIMES, THE ENTITY IS SUBJECT TO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX BASED ON ITS ACTIVITIES. FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2022 AND 2021, THE ORGANIZATION DID NOT IDENTIFY ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN, WHICH WOULD REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT OR DISCLOSURE IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION IS CURRENT WITH RESPECT TO FILING OF IRS FORM 990S.

AN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION OF ELWYN'S PRESIDENT. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF ELWYN OF PENNSYLVANIA AND DELAWARE, THE PARENT ORGANIZATION AT THE TIME, APPROVED THE PRESIDENT'S EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT AFTER THOROUGH CONSULTATION WITH COMPENSATION PROFESSIONALS AND REVIEW OF COMPENSATION PAID BY COMPARABLE NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS. THE CURRENT CONTRACT COVERS COMPENSATION BETWEEN MARCH 1, 2017, AND JUNE 30, 2022.

DURING THE FISCAL YEAR ENDING JUNE 30, 2021, FSS BEGAN TRANSFERRING ITS PROGRAMS AND CONTRACTS TO ELWYN PA. AS PART OF THE TRANSFER, THE EMPLOYEES OF FSS BECAME EMPLOYEES OF ELWYN PA. DURING THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2022, FSS DID NOT PROVIDE ANY SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 6:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ELWYN OF PENNSYLVANIA AND DELAWARE IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Lines 7a & 7b:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ELWYN OF PENNSYLVANIA AND DELAWARE, AS THE SOLE MEMBER, RESERVES, AMONG OTHERS, THE POWER TO APPOINT THE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS INTERNALLY PREPARED AND SENT TO OUR EXTERNAL PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM FOR REVIEW AND COMPILATION. THE COMPLETED RETURN IS THEN SENT BACK TO THE ORGANIZATION AND IS REVIEWED AND ACCEPTED BY THE ELWYN FOUNDATION'S AUDIT COMMITTEE, THE PARENT ORGANIZATION OF ELWYN OF PENNSYLVANIA AND DELAWARE. PRIOR TO FILING, THE FORM 990 IS SENT TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ELWYN FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ELWYN FOUNDATION REVIEWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ON A PERIODIC BASIS. BOARD MEMBERS COMPLETE CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. THE COMPLETED FORMS ARE MAINTAINED BY THE ASSISTANT SECRETARY OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Lines 15a & 15b:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION OF ELWYN'S PRESIDENT. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF ELWYN OF PENNSYLVANIA AND DELAWARE, THE PARENT ORGANIZATION AT THE TIME, APPROVED THE PRESIDENT'S EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT AFTER THOROUGH CONSULTATION WITH COMPENSATION PROFESSIONALS AND REVIEW OF COMPENSATION PAID BY COMPARABLE NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS. THE CURRENT CONTRACT COVERS COMPENSATION BETWEEN MARCH 1, 2017, AND JUNE 30, 2022. ANNUALLY, ELWYN OF PENNSYVLANIA AND DELAWARE'S PRESIDENT DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION PAID TO OTHER SENIOR EXECUTIVES based on information from an independent consultant. The compensation information for these employees was distributed to the compensation and executive committees of the board of directors for their review and approval.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF THE ELWYN FOUNDATION AND SUBSIDIARIES ARE AVAILABLE THROUGH PUBLIC SOURCES AS A RESULT OF THE TAX-EXEMPT BOND FINANCING. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT MAKE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.

RelatedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: Elwyn Health Services of Pennsylvania PC
